about_quote: I’m a computer science student from Munich, currently doing my Masters degree at LMU. I’ve been passionate about computers and programming ever since my grandpa taught my how to write simple programs in BASIC. In my free time I like to play sports and explore the world.

education.bachelor_thesis: Bachelor Thesis “Action Quality Assessment of Trampline Routines”: Automatically judging the Olympic Trampoline event from videos with Deep Learning
